text.text: After a player has declared attackers, you may spend 1 [[basic]] and place 1 exhaustion token on this spell. If you do, add 1 to a target unit's attack value for the remainder of this turn.
In addition, you may draw 1 card. If you do, discard 1 card.

text.name: Focus 1
text.text: In addition, you may select 1 die in your exhausted pool, re-roll it, and place it into your active pool.
